#BlackMagicCraft #Episode157 #BEGINNER

This project is as simple as it gets and covers some of the most important fundamentals of crafting. An obelisk is a great piece of scatter terrain that works well in skirmish games as well as narrative driven TTRPG's.

title: THE OBELISK - Practice Project for BEGINNERS
